overview: Get to know some of Hollywood's most talented character actors, who have supported leading roles in films for decades.  Some have even gone on to become stars in their own right. They proudly stand in the shadows of the "stars" of the movies, content to play the roles that lend flavor and depth to the films, with their unique brands of humor, intensity and charisma, leaving lasting impressions on all of us in movie after movie.
title: The Face Is Familiar
